description:
Torque Nuts fits well in standard crack placements, but they have the extra advantage of camming into position if you place them in a horizontal. They work in straight-sided cracks, and are way lighter than a full rack of big-crack cams. Doubled slings allow them to ride high when they are racked, but reduce drag when extended.

  • Aluminum alloy head and sling are colour-coded
  • Recessed heads prevent abrasion of the sling
  • Dyneema bartack is shrink wrapped for extra protection
  • Tapered shape provides a wide range of placement options
name: DMM Torque Nut Set 1-4
